title: Thai-inspired tuna stir-fry
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons fish sauce', '7 tablespoons fresh lime juice', '2 tablespoons honey', '1kg (2 1/4 lb) fresh tuna steaks, cubed', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '4 fresh tomatoes, chopped', '1 bunch spring onion, finely chopped', '1 small fresh red chilli, seeded and chopped', 'handful fresh chopped coriander', 'handful fresh chopped basil']
